entry.title: A Christmas Story Christmas â€“ Official Trailer

media:group.media:title: A Christmas Story Christmas â€“ Official Trailer
media:group.media:description:
We triple dog dare you to join in on the fun. Ralphie returns in the trailer for #AChristmasStoryChristmas â€“ streaming on HBO Max November 17.
From Warner Bros. Pictures and HBO Max comes the family comedy â€œA Christmas Story Christmas,â€ the long-awaited follow-up to annual holiday favorite, â€œA Christmas Story.â€ This time, Ralphie is all grown up and must deal with Christmas and all that comes with itâ€¦as a dad. Peter Billingsley returns to the role that has made kids of all ages anticipate Christmas morning like no other.
Starring alongside Billingsley as Ralphie Parker are Erinn Hayes (â€œBill & Ted Face the Musicâ€) as Ralphieâ€™s wife, Sandy; Julianna Layne (â€œProdigal Sonâ€) as their daughter, Julie; River Drosche (â€œMiracle Workersâ€) as son Mark; Scott Schwartz returning as Flick; RD Robb returning as Schwartz; Ian Petrella reprising his role as Ralphieâ€™s brother, Randy; Davis Murphy (â€œLooking for Dr. Loveâ€) as Delbert Bumpus; with Zack Ward returning as Scut Farkus; and Julie Hagerty (â€œInstant Familyâ€) as Ralphieâ€™s mom, Mrs. Parker.
Clay Kaytis (â€œThe Christmas Chroniclesâ€) directed from a screenplay by Nick Schenk (â€œCry Machoâ€) and Kaytis, screen story by Schenk and Billingsley, based upon the book In God We Trust, All Others Pay Cash by Jean Shepherd. The filmâ€™s producers are Irwin Zwilling, Marc Toberoff, Cale Boyter, Jay Ashenfelter, Billingsley and Vince Vaughn, with Mike Drake, Schenk and Peter Dodd serving as executive producers.
Kaytisâ€™s team behind the camera includes director of photography Matthew Clark (â€œPitch Perfect 3,â€ â€œMixtapeâ€), production designer Rusty Smith (â€œGet Out,â€ â€œLife of the Partyâ€), editor David Walsh Heinz (â€œThe Call of the Wildâ€) and costume designer Shay Cunliffe (â€œBook Club,â€ â€œA Dogâ€™s Purposeâ€). The music is by composer Jeff Morrow.
Warner Bros. Pictures and HBO MAX Present A Legendary Pictures / Wild West Picture Show / Toberoff Production, A Clay Kaytis Film, â€œA Christmas Story Christmas.â€ The film will debut on HBO Max on November 17, 2022.

media:group.media:title: A Christmas Story Christmas | Teaser Trailer

media:group.media:title: HOUSE PARTY | Official Trailer
media:group.media:description:
roll up! itâ€™s time for a âš ï¸ HOUSE PARTY âš ï¸
check out the trailer for #houseparty, only in theaters january 13, and let us know if youâ€™re pullinâ€™ up ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¾
From New Line Cinema comes your VIP ticket into the hottest event of the year: â€œHouse Party,â€ the remix to the fan-favorite â€˜90s classic.
Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon (Tosin Cole) and Kevin (Jacob Latimore) are barely keeping things together. Out of money, down on their luck and about to lose the roofs over their headsâ€”and freshly fired from their low-lift jobs as house cleanersâ€”the pair needs a huge windfall to make their problems go away.
In a â€˜what the hell?â€™ move, they decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, the site of their last cleaning job, which just happens to belong to none other than LeBron James. No permission? No problem. What could go wrong?
How about a time traveling DJ, undependable security, a runaway guest list, one borrowed Lamborghini, angry rival promoters, a stolen championship ring, escalating property damage, an angry koala..?
But also, one outrageous ride stacked with double-take cameos and timeless throwback tracks, R-rated comedy and two friends worth cheering for... you have to see to believe.
After all, a night like this doesnâ€™t come around more than once.
â€œHouse Partyâ€ stars Tosin Cole (â€œ61st Street,â€ â€œTillâ€), Jacob Latimore (â€œDetroit,â€ â€œThe Chiâ€), Karen Obilom (â€œDoom Patrol,â€ â€œGames People Playâ€), D.C. Young Fly (â€œArmed,â€ â€œFor the Love of Moneyâ€) and Scott Mescudi (â€œThe Harder They Fall,â€ â€œDonâ€™t Look Upâ€), and is directed by Calmatic, the Grammy-winning music video director in his feature film debut. It is produced by LeBron James (â€œHustle,â€ â€œSpace Jam: A New Legacyâ€) and Maverick Carter (â€œThe Wall,â€ â€œWhatâ€™s My Name: Muhammad Aliâ€). â€œHouse Partyâ€ is written by Jamal Olori & Stephen Glover (â€œAtlantaâ€) and executive produced by Richard Brener, Josh Mack, Victoria Palmeri, Spencer Beighley, Jamal Henderson, Gretel Twombly, Reginald Hudlin and Warrington Hudlin.
Calmatic is joined behind the camera by director of photography Andrew Huebscher (â€œBig Time Adolescence,â€ â€œThe Bingeâ€), production designer Scott Falconer (â€œDope,â€ upcoming â€œUntitled Rick Famuyiwa Projectâ€), editor Matthew Barbato (â€œOnly Murders in the Building,â€ â€œDaveâ€), music supervisor Keir Lehman (â€œSpider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse,â€ â€œQueen & Slimâ€), costume designer Derica Cole Washington (â€œTwenties,â€ â€œZolaâ€) and composer Oak Felder (â€œThe United States vs. Billie Holiday,â€ â€œThe Equalizer 2â€).

entry.title: Don't Worry Darling | "In the Mirror" Clip

media:group.media:title: Don't Worry Darling | "In the Mirror" Clip
media:group.media:description:
Donâ€™t blink! #DontWorryDarling arrives in theaters tomorrow! Get your tickets now: https://www.dontworrydarling.movie/
From New Line Cinema comes â€œDonâ€™t Worry Darling,â€ directed by Olivia Wilde (â€œBooksmartâ€) and starring Florence Pugh (Oscar-nominated for â€œLittle Womenâ€), Harry Styles (â€œDunkirkâ€), Wilde (upcoming â€œBabylonâ€), Gemma Chan (â€œCrazy Rich Asiansâ€), KiKi Layne (â€œThe Old Guardâ€) and Chris Pine (â€œAll the Old Knivesâ€).
Alice (Pugh) and Jack (Styles) are lucky to be living in the idealized community of Victory, the experimental company town housing the men who work for the top-secret Victory Project and their families. The 1950â€™s societal optimism espoused by their CEO, Frank (Pine)â€”equal parts corporate visionary and motivational life coachâ€”anchors every aspect of daily life in the tight-knit desert utopia.
While the husbands spend every day inside the Victory Project Headquarters, working on the â€œdevelopment of progressive materials,â€ their wivesâ€”including Frankâ€™s elegant partner, Shelley (Chan)â€”get to spend their time enjoying the beauty, luxury and debauchery of their community. Life is perfect, with every residentâ€™s needs met by the company. All they ask in return is discretion and unquestioning commitment to the Victory cause.
But when cracks in their idyllic life begin to appear, exposing flashes of something much more sinister lurking beneath the attractive faÃ§ade, Alice canâ€™t help questioning exactly what theyâ€™re doing in Victory, and why. Just how much is Alice willing to lose to expose whatâ€™s really going on in this paradise?
An audacious, twisted and visually stunning psychological thriller, â€œDonâ€™t Worry Darlingâ€ is a powerhouse feature from director Olivia Wilde that boasts intoxicating performances from Florence Pugh and Harry Styles, surrounded by the impressive and pitch-perfect cast.
The film also stars Nick Kroll (â€œHow It Endsâ€), Sydney Chandler (â€œPistolâ€), Kate Berlant (â€œOnce Upon a Timeâ€¦ In Hollywoodâ€), Asif Ali (â€œWandaVisionâ€), Douglas Smith (â€œBig Little Liesâ€), Timothy Simons (â€œVeepâ€) and Ariâ€™el Stachel (upcoming â€œRespect the Juxâ€).
Wilde directs from a screenplay penned by her â€œBooksmartâ€ writer Katie Silberman, based on a story by Carey Van Dyke & Shane Van Dyke (â€œChernobyl Diariesâ€) and Silberman. The film is produced by Wilde, Silberman, Miri Yoon and Roy Lee, with Richard Brener, Celia Khong, Alex G. Scott, Catherine Hardwicke, Carey Van Dyke and Shane Van Dyke executive producing.
Wilde is joined behind the camera by two-time Oscar-nominated director of photography Matthew Libatique (â€œA Star Is Born,â€ â€œBlack Swanâ€), production designer Katie Byron (â€œBooksmartâ€), editor Affonso GonÃ§alves (â€œThe Lost Daughterâ€), Oscar-nominated composer John Powell (â€œJason Bourneâ€), music supervisor Randall Poster (â€œNo Time to Dieâ€) and costume designer Arianne Phillips (â€œOnce Upon a Timeâ€¦ In Hollywoodâ€).
A New Line Cinema presentation, â€œDonâ€™t Worry Darlingâ€ will be distributed worldwide by Warner Bros. Pictures and is set to open in theaters in North America on September 23, 2022 and internationally beginning 21 September 2022.

media:group.media:title: Black Adam | Legacy
media:group.media:description:
Long before the world of heroes and villains, #BlackAdamâš¡ï¸ruled it all.
A god with zero mercy and power born from rage.
The #ManInBlack hits theaters worldwideâ€¦
ONE MONTH FROM TODAY.
OCTOBER 21 ğŸŒ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- From New Line Cinema, Dwayne Johnson stars in the action adventure â€œBlack Adam.â€ The first-ever feature film to explore the story of the DC Super Hero comes to the big screen under the direction of Jaume Collet-Serra (â€œJungle Cruiseâ€).
In ancient Kahndaq, Teth Adam was bestowed the almighty powers of the gods. After using these powers for vengeance, he was imprisoned, becoming Black Adam. Nearly 5,000 years have passed and Black Adam has gone from man, to myth, to legend. Now released, his unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.
Johnson stars alongside Aldis Hodge (â€œCity on a Hill,â€ â€œOne Night in Miamiâ€) as Hawkman, Noah Centineo (â€œTo All the Boys Iâ€™ve Loved Beforeâ€) as Atom Smasher, Sarah Shahi (â€œSex/Life,â€ â€œRush Hour 3â€), Marwan Kenzari (â€œMurder on the Orient Express,â€ â€œThe Mummyâ€), Quintessa Swindell (â€œVoyagers,â€ â€œTrinketsâ€) as Cyclone, Mo Amer (â€œMo,â€ â€œRamyâ€), Bodhi Sabongui (â€œA Million Little Thingsâ€), and Pierce Brosnan (the â€œMamma Mia!â€ and James Bond franchises) as Dr. Fate.
Collet-Serra directed from a screenplay written by Adam Sztykiel and Rory Haines & Sohrab Noshirvani, based on characters from DC, based on characters created by Bill Parker and C.C. Beck. The filmâ€™s producers are Beau Flynn, Hiram Garcia, Dwayne Johnson and Dany Garcia, with Toby Emmerich, Richard Brener, Dave Neustadter, Chris Pan, Walter Hamada, Adam Schlagman, Geoff Johns, Eric McLeod and Scott Sheldon executive producing.
The directorâ€™s behind-the-scenes creative team includes Oscar-nominated director of photography Lawrence Sher (â€œJokerâ€), production designer Tom Meyer (â€œReal Steelâ€), editors Mike Sale (â€œRed Notice,â€ â€œSkyscraperâ€) and John Lee (â€œAnyone Home?â€), costume designers Kurt and Bart (â€œDeadpool 2,â€ â€œThe Hunger Games: Mockingjay â€“ Part 1 & 2â€), Oscar-winning visual effects supervisor Bill Westenhofer (â€œLife of Pi,â€ â€œWonder Womanâ€), and composer Lorne Balfe (â€œBlack Widowâ€).
New Line Cinema Presents a Seven Bucks/Flynn Co. Production, A Jaume Collet-Serra Film, â€œBlack Adam,â€ smashing into theaters and IMAX internationally beginning 19 October 2022, in North America on October 21, 2022. It will be distributed worldwide by Warner Bros. Pictures.

entry.title: SHAZAM! FURY OF THE GODS - Official Trailer 1

media:group.media:title: SHAZAM! FURY OF THE GODS - Official Trailer 1
media:group.media:description:
Check out the official trailer for Shazam! Fury of the Gods â€“ in theaters March 2023. #ShazamMovie
From New Line Cinema comes â€œShazam! Fury of the Gods,â€ which continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word â€œSHAZAM!,â€ is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.
â€œShazam! Fury of the Godsâ€ stars returning cast members Zachary Levi (â€œThor: Ragnarokâ€) as Shazam; Asher Angel (â€œAndi Mackâ€) as Billy Batson; Jack Dylan Grazer (â€œIt Chapter Twoâ€) as Freddy Freeman; Adam Brody (â€œPromising Young Womanâ€) as Super Hero Freddy; Ross Butler (â€œRaya and the Last Dragonâ€) as Super Hero Eugene; Meagan Good (â€œDay Shiftâ€) as Super Hero Darla; D.J. Cotrona (â€œG.I. Joe: Retaliationâ€) as Super Hero Pedro; Grace Caroline Currey (â€œAnnabelle: Creationâ€) as Mary Bromfield / Super Hero Mary; Faithe Herman (â€œThis Is Usâ€) as Darla Dudley; Ian Chen (â€œA Dogâ€™s Journeyâ€) as Eugene Choi; Jovan Armand (â€œSecond Chancesâ€) as Pedro Pena; Marta Milans (â€œWhite Linesâ€) as Rosa Vasquez; Cooper Andrews (â€œThe Walking Deadâ€) as Victor Vasquez; with Djimon Hounsou (â€œA Quiet Place Part IIâ€) as Wizard. Joining the cast are Rachel Zegler (â€œWest Side Storyâ€), with Lucy Liu (â€œKung Fu Pandaâ€ franchise) and Helen Mirren (â€œF9: The Fast Sagaâ€).
The film is directed by David F. Sandberg (â€œShazam!,â€ â€œAnnabelle: Creationâ€) and produced by Peter Safran (â€œAquaman,â€ â€œThe Suicide Squadâ€). It is written by Henry Gayden (â€œShazam!,â€ â€œThereâ€™s Someone Inside Your Houseâ€) and Chris Morgan (â€œFast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw,â€ â€œThe Fate of the Furiousâ€), based on characters from DC; Shazam! was created by Bill Parker and C.C. Beck.
Executive producers are Walter Hamada, Adam Schlagman, Richard Brener, Dave Neustadter, Victoria Palmeri, Marcus Viscidi and Geoff Johns. Joining director Sandberg behind-the-camera are director of photography Gyula Pados (the â€œJumanjiâ€ franchise), production designer Paul Kirby (â€œThe Old Guard,â€ â€œJason Bourneâ€) and editor Michel Aller (â€œShazam!,â€ â€œThe Nunâ€). The music supervisor is Season Kent (â€œDC League of Super-Pets,â€ â€œThe Addams Family 2â€) and the music is by Christophe Beck (â€œFree Guy,â€ â€œFrozen IIâ€). Visual effects supervisors are Bruce Jones (â€œAquaman,â€ â€œItâ€) and Raymond Chen (â€œAlita: Battle Angel,â€ â€œThe Megâ€). The costume designer is Louise Mingenbach (â€œJumanji: The Next Level,â€ â€œGodzilla: King of the Monstersâ€).
New Line Cinema presents A Peter Safran Production of A David F. Sandberg Film, â€œShazam! Fury of the Gods,â€ which is set to open in theaters internationally beginning 15 December 2022 and in North America on December 21, 2022.

media:group.media:title: Don't Worry Darling | Official Trailer #2
media:group.media:description:
Are you ready to live the life you deserve? #DontWorryDarling Only in theaters September 23.
From New Line Cinema comes â€œDonâ€™t Worry Darling,â€ directed by Olivia Wilde (â€œBooksmartâ€) and starring Florence Pugh (Oscar-nominated for â€œLittle Womenâ€), Harry Styles (â€œDunkirkâ€), Wilde (upcoming â€œBabylonâ€), Gemma Chan (â€œCrazy Rich Asiansâ€), KiKi Layne (â€œThe Old Guardâ€) and Chris Pine (â€œAll the Old Knivesâ€).
Alice (Pugh) and Jack (Styles) are lucky to be living in the idealized community of Victory, the experimental company town housing the men who work for the top-secret Victory Project and their families. The 1950â€™s societal optimism espoused by their CEO, Frank (Pine)â€”equal parts corporate visionary and motivational life coachâ€”anchors every aspect of daily life in the tight-knit desert utopia.
While the husbands spend every day inside the Victory Project Headquarters, working on the â€œdevelopment of progressive materials,â€ their wivesâ€”including Frankâ€™s elegant partner, Shelley (Chan)â€”get to spend their time enjoying the beauty, luxury and debauchery of their community. Life is perfect, with every residentâ€™s needs met by the company. All they ask in return is discretion and unquestioning commitment to the Victory cause.
But when cracks in their idyllic life begin to appear, exposing flashes of something much more sinister lurking beneath the attractive faÃ§ade, Alice canâ€™t help questioning exactly what theyâ€™re doing in Victory, and why. Just how much is Alice willing to lose to expose whatâ€™s really going on in this paradise?
An audacious, twisted and visually stunning psychological thriller, â€œDonâ€™t Worry Darlingâ€ is a powerhouse feature from director Olivia Wilde that boasts intoxicating performances from Florence Pugh and Harry Styles, surrounded by the impressive and pitch-perfect cast.
The film also stars Nick Kroll (â€œHow It Endsâ€), Sydney Chandler (â€œPistolâ€), Kate Berlant (â€œOnce Upon a Timeâ€¦ In Hollywoodâ€), Asif Ali (â€œWandaVisionâ€), Douglas Smith (â€œBig Little Liesâ€), Timothy Simons (â€œVeepâ€) and Ariâ€™el Stachel (upcoming â€œRespect the Juxâ€).
Wilde directs from a screenplay penned by her â€œBooksmartâ€ writer Katie Silberman, based on a story by Carey Van Dyke & Shane Van Dyke (â€œChernobyl Diariesâ€) and Silberman. The film is produced by Wilde, Silberman, Miri Yoon and Roy Lee, with Richard Brener, Celia Khong, Alex G. Scott, Catherine Hardwicke, Carey Van Dyke and Shane Van Dyke executive producing.
Wilde is joined behind the camera by two-time Oscar-nominated director of photography Matthew Libatique (â€œA Star Is Born,â€ â€œBlack Swanâ€), production designer Katie Byron (â€œBooksmartâ€), editor Affonso GonÃ§alves (â€œThe Lost Daughterâ€), Oscar-nominated composer John Powell (â€œJason Bourneâ€), music supervisor Randall Poster (â€œNo Time to Dieâ€) and costume designer Arianne Phillips (â€œOnce Upon a Timeâ€¦ In Hollywoodâ€).
A New Line Cinema presentation, â€œDonâ€™t Worry Darlingâ€ will be distributed worldwide by Warner Bros. Pictures and is set to open in theaters in North America on September 23, 2022 and internationally beginning 21 September 2022.

entry.title: Baz Luhrmannâ€™s ELVIS | â€œTroubleâ€ Lyric Video

media:group.media:title: Baz Luhrmannâ€™s ELVIS | â€œTroubleâ€ Lyric Video
media:group.media:description:
If youâ€™re looking for trouble, you came to the right place. âš¡ï¸ Austin Butler stars in Baz Luhrmannâ€™s #ElvisMovie. Get your tickets now and experience it only in theaters TODAY! #TCB https://elvis.warnerbros.com
https://www.facebook.com/ElvisMovie https://www.instagram.com/ElvisMovie https://twitter.com/ElvisMovie https://www.tiktok.com/@ElvisFilm
ELVIS is an epic, big-screen spectacle from Warner Bros. Pictures and visionary, Oscar-nominated filmmaker Baz Luhrmann that explores the life and music of Elvis Presley, starring Austin Butler and Oscar winner Tom Hanks.
A thoroughly cinematic drama, Elvisâ€™s (Butler) story is seen through the prism of his complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker (Hanks). As told by Parker, the film delves into the complex dynamic between the two spanning over 20 years, from Presleyâ€™s rise to fame to his unprecedented stardom, against the backdrop of the evolving cultural landscape and loss of innocence in America. Central to that journey is one of the significant and influential people in Elvisâ€™s life, Priscilla Presley (Olivia DeJonge).
Starring alongside Butler and Hanks, award-winning theatre actress Helen Thomson (â€œTop of the Lake: China Girl,â€ â€œRakeâ€) plays Elvisâ€™s mother, Gladys, Richard Roxburgh (â€œMoulin Rouge!â€ â€œBreath,â€ â€œHacksaw Ridgeâ€) portrays Elvisâ€™s father, Vernon, and DeJonge (â€œThe Visit,â€ â€œStray Dollsâ€) plays Priscilla. Luke Bracey (â€œHacksaw Ridge,â€ â€œPoint Breakâ€) plays Jerry Schilling, Natasha Bassett (â€œHail, Caesar!â€) plays Dixie Locke, David Wenham (â€œThe Lord of the Ringsâ€ Trilogy, â€œLion,â€ â€œ300â€) plays Hank Snow, Kelvin Harrison Jr. (â€œThe Trial of the Chicago 7,â€ â€œThe High Noteâ€) plays B.B. King, Xavier Samuel (â€œAdore,â€ â€œLove & Friendship,â€ â€œThe Twilight Saga: Eclipseâ€) plays Scotty Moore, and Kodi Smit-McPhee (â€œThe Power of the Dogâ€) plays Jimmie Rodgers Snow.
Also in the cast, Dacre Montgomery (â€œStranger Things,â€ â€œThe Broken Heart Galleryâ€) plays TV director Steve Binder, alongside Australian actors Leon Ford (â€œGallipoli,â€ â€œThe Pacificâ€) as Tom Diskin, Kate Mulvany (â€œThe Great Gatsby,â€ â€œHuntersâ€) as Marion Keisker, Gareth Davies (â€œPeter Rabbit,â€ â€œHuntersâ€) as Bones Howe, Charles Grounds (â€œCrazy Rich Asians,â€ â€œCampâ€) as Billy Smith, Josh McConville (â€œFantasy Islandâ€) as Sam Phillips, and Adam Dunn (â€œHome and Awayâ€) as Bill Black.
To play additional iconic musical artists in the film, Luhrmann cast singer/songwriter Yola as Sister Rosetta Tharpe, model Alton Mason as Little Richard, Austin, Texas native Gary Clark Jr. as Arthur Crudup, and artist Shonka Dukureh as Willie Mae â€œBig Mamaâ€ Thornton.
Oscar nominee Luhrmann (â€œThe Great Gatsby,â€ â€œMoulin Rouge!â€) directed from a screenplay by Baz Luhrmann & Sam Bromell and Baz Luhrmann & Craig Pearce and Jeremy Doner, story by Baz Luhrmann and Jeremy Doner. The filmâ€™s producers are Luhrmann, Oscar winner Catherine Martin (â€œThe Great Gatsby,â€ â€œMoulin Rouge!â€), Gail Berman, Patrick McCormick and Schuyler Weiss. Toby Emmerich, Courtenay Valenti and Kevin McCormick executive produced.
The directorâ€™s behind-the-scenes creative team includes director of photography Mandy Walker (â€œMulan,â€ â€œAustraliaâ€), Oscar-winning production designer and costume designer Catherine Martin (â€œThe Great Gatsby,â€ â€œMoulin Rouge!â€), production designer Karen Murphy (â€œA Star Is Bornâ€), editors Matt Villa (â€œThe Great Gatsby,â€ â€œAustraliaâ€) and Jonathan Redmond (â€œThe Great Gatsbyâ€), Oscar-nominated visual effects supervisor Thomas Wood (â€œMad Max: Fury Roadâ€), music supervisor Anton Monsted (â€œAustralia,â€ â€œMoulin Rouge!â€) and composer Elliott Wheeler (â€œThe Get Downâ€).
Principal photography on â€œElvisâ€ took place in Queensland, Australia with the support of the Queensland Government, Screen Queensland, and the Australian Governmentâ€™s Producer Offset program.
A Warner Bros. Pictures Presentation, A Bazmark Production, A Jackal Group Production, A Baz Luhrmann Film, â€œElvisâ€ will be distributed worldwide by Warner Bros. Pictures. It is set to release in theaters in North America on June 24, 2022, and internationally beginning 22 June 2022.

entry.title: DC League of Super-Pets | Meet The Pets - Chip

media:group.media:title: DC League of Super-Pets | Meet The Pets - Chip
media:group.media:description:
https://www.facebook.com/DCLeagueOfSu... https://www.instagram.com/dcleagueofs... https://twitter.com/DCSuperPets
-----------------
Dwayne Johnson stars as the voice of Krypto the Super-Dog in Warner Bros. Picturesâ€™ animated action adventure feature film â€œDC League of Super-Pets,â€ from director Jared Stern.
The film also stars the voices of Kevin Hart (the â€œJumanjiâ€ and â€œSecret Life of Petsâ€ films), Kate McKinnon (â€œSaturday Night Live,â€ the â€œMagic School Bus Rides Againâ€ films, â€œFerdinandâ€), John Krasinski (the â€œQuiet Placeâ€ films, â€œFree Guyâ€), Vanessa Bayer (â€œSaturday Night Live,â€ â€œOffice Christmas Party,â€ â€œTrainwreckâ€), Natasha Lyonne (â€œShow Dogs,â€ â€œBallmastrz 9009â€), Diego Luna (â€œRogue One: A Star Wars Story,â€ â€œMaya and the Threeâ€), Marc Maron (â€œJoker,â€ â€œGLOWâ€), Thomas Middleditch (â€œGodzilla: King of the Monsters,â€ â€œCaptain Underpants: The First Epic Movieâ€), Ben Schwartz (â€œSonic the Hedgehog,â€ â€œDuck Talesâ€), and Keanu Reeves (the â€œMatrixâ€ and â€œJohn Wickâ€ films).
In â€œDC League of Super-Pets,â€ Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime in Metropolis side by side. When Superman and the rest of the Justice League are kidnapped, Krypto must convince a rag-tag shelter packâ€”Ace the hound, PB the potbellied pig, Merton the turtle and Chip the squirrelâ€”to master their own newfound powers and help him rescue the Super Heroes.
Stern, a veteran writer/consultant on the â€œLEGOÂ®â€ movies, makes his animated feature film directorial debut, directing from a screenplay he wrote with frequent collaborator John Whittington, based on characters from DC, Superman created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster. The film is produced by Patricia Hicks, Dwayne Johnson, Dany Garcia, Hiram Garcia and Jared Stern. The executive producers are John Requa, Glenn Ficarra, Nicholas Stoller, Allison Abbate, Chris Leahy, Sharon Taylor and Courtenay Valenti. Sternâ€™s creative team includes production designer Kim Taylor (â€œThe LEGOÂ® Ninjago Movieâ€) and editors David Egan (â€œGame Night,â€ â€œVacationâ€) and Jhoanne Reyes (â€œTeen Titans GO!â€ â€œYoung Justiceâ€). The music is by Steve Jablonsky (the â€œTransformersâ€ films).
Warner Bros. Pictures Presents A Seven Bucks Production, â€œDC League of Super-Pets.â€ The film will be released by Warner Bros. Pictures in theaters internationally beginning 27 July 2022 and in North America on July 29, 2022.
